message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss pricing.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the product's value, but $110 is a bit above my budget.  I'd be willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $107 for the product?
